scripts.build: closure-compiler --js node_modules/google-closure-library/closure/goog/base.js --js source/javascript/index.js --js source/javascript/normalizeOptions --js source/javascript/createSingleUseGate --js source/javascript/interpolation --compilation_level ADVANCED --language_out ECMASCRIPT5_STRICT --use_types_for_optimization --assume_function_wrapper --js_output_file library/index.js --output_wrapper "%output%module.exports=this.e;"
